items.title: Date search in article list
items.description: It is now possible to search for articles based on date in the editor when opening the article list (A).

items.title: Hide paywall-offers
items.description: The latest version of Labrador can now let you display paywall-posters without offers. This is useful for embedding in native apps. Use by adding param `?lab_opts=paywall_loginonly` to the url of an article behind paywall.

items.title: Fixed section-bug in article settings
items.description: A bug making it hard to change the section of an article in article-settings is now fixed.

items.title: Scrollbox: Article added as the first
items.description: When an article is dragged into the scrollbox, it is now being added as the first article instead of the last.

items.title: Edit-link i article list
items.description: Articles in the article-list now display a link to edit the original article. Hit A to open the article-list.
